actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 1014 of the Internal Revenue Code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the estate tax, to provide that the basis of an interest in farming or small business property in the hands of a person acquiring such interest from the decedent shall be the fair market value of the property. Requires an increase in the basis of property acquired in a generation-skipping transfer before the transferor's death by an amount equal to the generation-skipping tax imposed.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 1014 of the Internal Revenue Code.
